author: Highly Driven Products LLC
comment: Can't even find it on my phone so I can use it. Where is it?? Does not work or show up on my phone. Give me back my dollar!!
title: Can't find it

author: paul richman
comment: Excellent app!  I'd really like day and date options, to make these faces more watch like. I'd love a slideshow capability. Also, fix bug - app doesn't handle extra wide photos properly.  Then 5  stars.
title: It works well

author: Randy Perez
comment: I like this app to personalize my watch with my pics, but I would like to see two options added: 1) Please give me the option for a digital face, or at least some extra info during ambient like bat power and date. 2) I would have loved it if I could pick a few pics at a time and the watch will periodically switch the pics automatically. However, for a dollar, I recommend it.
title: Nice App, Could be Better

author: Brandon Whitmer
comment: I wish I had more options for the actual watch function, but the upside of getting to make my watch face any pic I want is worth it.
title: Love it

author: Mike Zmich
comment: Would like to see digital added though
title: Great does the job

reply.author: Raxilwear
reply.content: You must go to the Android Wear app and manage the watchface settings from there.

author: Nicolas Rosenfeld
title: keep it simple, it's working well with my family photos
